boardgame.name: PÜNCT
Punct
boardgame.description: P_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;Uuml;NCT, the fifth released game by design in project GIPF, is a connection game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The goal is to connect two opposite sides of the board. A player's turn consists of either bringing a new piece into play or moving one already on the board._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This game is part of project GIPF._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

2006 International Gamers Award - General Strategy: Two-players
2006 Japan Boardgame Prize Best Foreign Game for Beginners Nominee
2007 Games Magazine Best New Abstract Strategy Game Winner

listing.notes: never played +++++ english, german, french, dutch, spanish and italian version. game components are completely language independent +++++ will be shipped with insurance +++++ payment for usa, canada, asia or australia : paypal or cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ payment for other non-euro-countries : cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ payment for european countries, that have euro : cash (by letter) or bank transfer (wich by the way is cost-free !) +++++ payment for germany : personal pick up in berlin or bank transfer +++++ foreign buyers beware : german postal sadly is very expensive for foreign packages (about 18 - 45 euros, it depends on, where the package has to be shipped and the weight), pleask at for shipping prices, before you buy !) +++++ shipping inside germany will cost 8 euros, including insurance

Game is brand new with publisher shrink-wrap. Save 30% or more off of every item we have listed on Boardgamegeek.com! Items are shipped within one or two business days upon reciept of payment (remember, money order, cashier_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s check or cash at your own risk!) If you do not wish to send payment and would rather pay us directly, you can give us a call at 816.554.7333 (Tuesday through Saturday) using Visa, Mastercard and American Express or by contacting us in order to make a Paypal payment (a 4.5% surcharge will be added to the total payment.) Shipping is based off of weight so it completely depends on the game(s) themselves though the average is $7 - $9.00 throughout the Continental US (and yes, we will combine on shipping!!!). If you need a specific type of shipping - such as Overnight or with Insurance - or have any questions, drop us an email. MO orders pay 7.35% sales tax. Also be sure to be on the lookout for PREORDER games being listed for the upcoming months! For more info about the store visit www.pfcomics.com (be sure to check out our forums for our weekly and monthly events).

Rio Grande Games (RIO 283) Type: Abstract Strategy Number of players: 2 Age of players: 9+ Length: 30 minutes Game Description: PÜNCT is the final game of Project GIPF, a series of games that, as you probably know, was announced to consist of 6 games and a number of sets with additional pieces. GIPF, the central game of the Project, was initially release in Belgium in 1997. Now, 8 years later, the series is complete.PÜNCT is a connection game: the goal is to link two opposite sites. On your turn, you either bring a new piece into play, or you move a piece that is already on the board. The more pieces you bring into play, the more possibilities you have to make a connection. Butx each time you put a new piece on the board, you reveal a bit of what your plan is. The trick is to place your pieces in such a way that your opponent will expect you to do something different from what you really have in mind. As such, PÜNCT is not only about making a connection, but also about misleading your opponent! You’ll have to proceed subtle!

Rio Grande Games (RIO283) PÜNCT is the final game of Project GIPF, a series of games that, as you probably know, was announced to consist of 6 games and a number of sets with additional pieces. GIPF, the central game of the Project, was initially release in Belgium in 1997. Now, the series is complete. PÜNCT is a connection game: the goal is to link two opposite sites. On your turn, you either bring a new piece into play, or you move a piece that is already on the board. The more pieces you bring into play, the more possibilities you have to make a connection. But... each time you put a new piece on the board, you reveal a bit of what your plan is. The trick_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s to place your pieces in such a way that your opponent will expect you to do something different from what you really have in mind. As such, PÜNCT is not only about making a connection, but also about misleading your opponent! You_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll have to proceed subtle!
